Index.title: Home
Index.intro: This is a template for a React web application using the <LinkToNextJs>Next.js framework</LinkToNextJs>.
Index.body:
This is template includes:
  • Framework for server-side rendered, static, or hybrid React applications
  • TypeScript and React testing tools
  • U.S. Web Design System for themeable styling and a set of common components
  • Type checking, linting, and code formatting tools
  • Storybook for a frontend workshop environment
Index.alert: This website is a work in progress. To search for funding opportunities and apply, visit <LinkToGrants>www.grants.gov</LinkToGrants>.
Index.goal_paragraph_1: We want Grants.gov to be the simplest, most inclusive, and most gratifying tool ever built for posting, finding, sharing, and applying for financial assistance. Our mission is to create a more equitable grantmaking experience that ensures all communities are served by the process.
Index.goal_paragraph_2: We’re building a one-stop shop for all federal discretionary funding to make it easy for you to discover, understand, and apply for opportunities that meet your needs.
Index.goal_paragraph_3: If you work for a federal grantmaking agency, we’re making it easier for you to write, post, announce, and manage funding opportunities that reach underserved communities.
